ygData.subject: Eye of Zomm Incredible Discovery!
ygData.msgSnippet: Wizards of Norrath Rejoice!  The Eye of Zomm (Level 4 spell that makes an eye avatar for you to control) gives you the power of a rogue!  It is a universal
ygData.messageBody:
Wizards of Norrath Rejoice! The Eye of Zomm (Level 4 spell that makes an eye
avatar for you to control) gives you the power of a rogue! It is a universal
key!! the eye can open ANY door in the game! See ya locks! I know this
seems rather sucky at first (ye canna walk through the door, since you are
controlling the eye), but as yall pointed out, ye can train out the door
whatever ye need! Yay for us



Talar Firebrand, level 29 dark elf wizard, Rallos Zek
